projectGridLines.title: Data-driven approach to identify, understand and scope complex data problems on Uber platforms
projectGridLines.description:
We're looking for a Intern to join the team for to apply a data-driven

approach to identify, understand and scope complex data problems (including risk,

fraud, payment, support experience and our Mobility and delivery lines of business) on

the Uber platform.

About Uber

At Uber, we ignite opportunity by setting the world in motion. We take on big problems

to help drivers, riders, delivery partners, and eaters get moving in more than 10,000

cities around the world. We welcome people from all backgrounds who seek the

opportunity to help build a future where everyone and everything can move

independently. If you have the curiosity, passion, and collaborative spirit, work with us,

and let's move the world forward together.
